dc_description_s: Direct Protection Areas (Current: 2019-06-17) for California. This dataset indicates the agency/organization with primary responsibility for suppressing wildland fire within each polygon boundary. Direct Protection Area Polygons as approved by the California Wildland Fire Coordinating Group (CWCG) as of June, 2019. Each polygon has attribute information indicating the agency or organization with primary responsibility for wildland fire supression in that area. Fire and Resource Assessment Program (Calif.). (2019). Direct Protection Areas, California, 2019. Fire and Resource Assessment Program (Calif.). Available at: https://purl.stanford.edu/qh995pz3766
